TextView.android:text: EXAMPLE TESTIMONY --- \n\n When I was a young girl, my father took me into the city to see a marching band. He said, daughther when you grow up would you be a savior of the broken, the beaten, and the damned. He said, will you defeat them, their demons, and all the non-believers, the plans that they have made. Because one day, I'll leave you a phantom to lead you in the summer to join the Black Parade.
